original: intros f g a b pr_f pr_g H. assert (Hri : Riemann_integrable g a b). { eapply Riemann_integrable_ext. apply H. apply pr_f. } destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hab | Hba]. - apply RiemannInt_P18 with (pr2 := pr_g). apply Hab. intros x Hx. apply H. rewrite Rmin_left in Hx. rewrite Rmax_right in Hx. apply Hx. apply Rle_trans with b. apply Hx. apply Rle_refl. - exfalso. apply Rnot_le_gt in Hba. apply Hba. apply Rle_trans with (Rmax a b). rewrite Rmax_right. apply Rle_refl. apply Rle_not_gt. rewrite Rmax_left in Hba. apply Rlt_asym. apply Hba. apply Rle_refl.
